website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Basket Heart Patent, with its stylish and eye-catching design, captures the heart of many fashionable sneaker fans. At first sight, many were impressed by the shoe’s satin laces and patent leather upper. Overall, this shoe is absolutely a wear-everywhere sneaker.
pros: According to some reviews, the sneaker is very comfortable even if worn for long-hours
The unique and stylish design of the Puma Basket Heart Patent shoes gains the approval of various fans
Many are happy with the satin and chunky laces included because they can wear the sneaker in different styles
Based on some reviews, the oversized laces of the sneaker is really eye-catching
A few mention that the shoe is very easy to clean
Most of the fashionable fans are very happy that they can wear the sneaker with almost anything in their closet
The toe-box is wide enough to give room for the toes to wiggle comfortably
The Basket Heart Patent has a nice fit, according to some user reviews
A good number of buyers receive compliments while wearing this sneaker
cons: Some users mention that the Basket Heart Patent from Puma feels a little stiff out of the box
A handful of reviewers notice a small squeaking noise when moving around

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for me, but some people would love them.
customer_reviews.text: These looked good initially but as soon as I put them on and walked around the heel of the shoes slid up and down obviously too loose. The toes however were a bit too tight, so if I had changed them for another pair (smaller) the heels may have fitted but the toes would have been far too small. Shame, so I had to return them. They were fun though, lovely chunky laces and there was a pair of shiny ribbon laces enclosed as an alternative. Some people out there must find them to be great, they just weren’t for me I am afraid. I hope my comments help people when choosing their size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlelover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are freaking awesome. I get a lot of compliments. If you love chunky shoes you'll love these! They do make a squeaky rubbing sound from the Shiney material running again each other
customer_reviews.author: Curiouscarnage

customer_reviews.title: pretty but really large fit
customer_reviews.text: i would say to drop a size or a size and a half, really long trainers they looked gigantic on and weren’t as nice as the picture so sent back that and patent shoes made like this are a nightmare for rubbing together and when i tried walking in them it sounded like my whole body was breaking and making some interesting noises 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kelloo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy dressy trainer, very easy to maintain white!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these, super comfortable and really dressy with the extra wide laces. Really nice to wear with skirts and dresses for a cool casual vibe. Major bonus in that these are water-resistant and very easy to just wipe clean & maintain a brand spanking new white look. Has a really unusual elasticated band on the inner side of tounge which makes popping them on & off really easy allowing you to keep the extra wide laces firmly knotted (prettily) without tying & retying with no crushing of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: MsMax

customer_reviews.title: Slightly big but great look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but they are on the large size I’m between a 6/7 so got a 6.5 and find they are slightly large so I’d say go slightly smaller when buying but I still love the look they are smart and I love them so going to get an insole for them xxxx
customer_reviews.author: Clobby1998

customer_reviews.title: Definitely come up big
customer_reviews.text: Even though I've returned these I've given them 5 stars because they're lovely trainers, they just looked funny with my skinny legs! They definitely come up big, I'm always a size 5 but the backs were slipping so I'd say go down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: These were an absolute bargain. Stumbled across them by accident. But oh my gosh, they’re so comfortable. And look so much better then the pictures let on. It’s nice to have 2 different kinds of laces as well. I love them. I also have a broken baby toe at the moment and these are the only shoes I now own that doesn’t hurt to wear. So really happy.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer - smart and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these trainers. They come up slightly big but wasnt an issue and I did not send them back as I gifted them to my niece. I really like the fact they come with two sets of laces - one chunky one and one ribbon. They are a great colour and so easy to clean - just wipe them!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Another Design to Love!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from the US and wore my Pumas with the bow at the back. They were well liked and everyone called them retro! You couldn't find this design in the US so I'm happy to come back and purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great. I bought half a size smaller because of the other reviews . It sometimes looked a bit large / wide at the back but if you loosen and tighten the laces, it helps. However, it started to squeak after a few months so that put me off wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lula

customer_reviews.title: Soles are very hard
customer_reviews.text: The soles on these shoes are so hard I felt I was walking on two pieces of wood. Impossible to wsear and as I had tried for a few days to break them in couldn't send them back and so charity shop benefitted!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rabet

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but were far too big!
customer_reviews.text: Came beautifully packaged and with an extra set of laces. Loved them but they were far too big. My heels were falling out of them so unfortunately I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers, but cut into my toes
customer_reviews.text: Trainers are true to size, but after wareing them fir a few day. The trainers have creased across the toes. I cannot ware them now as they cut onto my toes leaving me feet in pain. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rebro

customer_reviews.title: Look great but really uncomfortable and squeek as you walk
customer_reviews.text: They look great but I can't walk in them very far and they loudly squeek as you walk which is quite annoying. If they didnt hurt as much then I would give them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers but I feel as though they are slightly too big, probably about half a size. If you really tighten the laces then they are a bit better. All in all they are very comfortable and look very nice and great value for money.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes - absolutely love them! They are however not as big as it says in the reviews. I ordered a size 7 after reading the reviews (as I'm a 7 in boots) and they just about fit. Half a size bigger would have been ideal. Love the different laces, too. They look gorgeous!

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers ive had!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE TRAINERS! They fit so well and they are really comfy! They come with a choice of chunky ribbon or chunky laces, they are wipe clean and have elastic inside so if you dont want to tie them traditionally you can just tuck the laces in! Super practical! Only annoyance is that when they are new, they are squeeky (not the soles,the actual body of the shoe) to start with until youve worn them in. Not an issue for me as I wore them everyday.

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Basket Heart Patent WN's Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: The Basket Heart Patent sees satin bow lacing grace our basketball icon, the PUMA Basket.
